content: the boulevard blanket knitting pattern design by fifty four ten studio © 2023 all rights reserved pattern contents photo & yarn used page 1 yarn suggestions page 2 knitting pattern page 2 size modifications & contact info page 3 photos page 4 yarn used lion brand hometown super bulky color washington denim #108 the boulevard blanket - knitting pattern design by fifty four ten studio © 2023 skill level - beginner / easy yarn suggestions six blanket sizes pattern designed for super bulky approximate sizes weight yarn on yarn label look for the 6 symbol baby 28 wide x 28 long for best appearance use a yarn with good small 35 wide x 40 long stitch definition chenille yarns are not the medium 38 wide x 46 long best option for this pattern because the stitch large 44 wide x 50 long definition is too soft click to learn more xl 47 wide x 55 long about these suggested yarns xxl 53 wide x 60 long lion brand wool-ease thick & quick see page 3 for size modification tips lion brand hometown lion brand re-spun thick & quick supplies  super bulky #6 weight yarn see more options on my website baby 320 - 330 yards bit ly/12superbulkyyarnsforblanketknitting5410 small 590 - 600 yards medium 730 - 740 yards large 925 - 940 yards xl 1100 - 1150 yards abbreviations xxl 1350 - 1400 yards k knit  us size 13 or 15 circular knitting needles 28 - 38 in length p purl or needle size best suited for your yarn & knitting gauge st stitch  tapestry needle sts stitches gauge garter stitch with size 13 or 15 needles about 8 5 sts & 14 5 row = 4 exact gauge is not essential however knitting should be fairly tight for desired appearance select needle size that gives the best appearance for your choice yarn and your knitting gauge directions directions for size baby with changes for sizes small medium large xl and xxl in parentheses with us size 13 or 15 circular needles cast on 57 sts for baby size blanket small 69 sts medium 75 sts large 87 sts xl 93 sts xxl 105 sts work back & forth on long circular needles to accommodate large number of stitches work as follows row 1 *k3 p3 repeat from * end k3 row 2 same as row 1 the pattern is made up of these 2 row repeat row 1 and 2 until blanket is 28 long for baby size small 40 long medium 46 long large 50 long xl 55 long xxl 60 long or desired length 2 the boulevard blanket - knitting pattern design by fifty four ten studio © 2023 finishing bind off in pattern when work is desired length cut yarn leaving an 8 tail with a tapestry needle carefully weave in ends on the wrong side block finished blanket if desired click here to see blocking tips on my website fiftyfourtenstudio com size modifications
